Class StaffList

java.lang.Object
StaffList
public class StaffList extends Object
The `StaffList` class manages a centralized list of staff members for a hospital management system. It provides functionality to add, remove, update, and retrieve staff details. Data is loaded from and written to a file to ensure persistence. This class follows the Singleton design pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static StaffList getInstance(String filePath)
      Provides the Singleton instance of the `StaffList`. Initializes the instance with the specified file path if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file where staff data is stored.
      Returns:
      the Singleton instance of the `StaffList`.

    • updateStaff

      public boolean updateStaff(String staffID, String fieldToUpdate, String newValue)
      Updates the specified field of a staff member identified by their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the ID of the staff member to update.
      fieldToUpdate - the field to update (e.g., "name", "email", "age").
      newValue - the new value to set for the specified field.
      Returns:
      `true` if the update was successful, otherwise `false`.

    • writeStaffToFile

      public void writeStaffToFile()
      Writes the current staff data to the file for persistence. Each staff member's details are written in CSV format.

    • getStaffById

      public User getStaffById(String staffID)
      Retrieves a staff member by their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the ID of the staff member to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the `User` object representing the staff member, or `null` if not found.

    • filterStaff

      public List<User> filterStaff(String filterType, String filterValue)
      Filters staff based on the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      filterType - the type of filter to apply (e.g., "role", "gender", "age").
      filterValue - the value to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of staff members matching the filter criteria.

    • getStaff

      public List<User> getStaff()
      Retrieves a list of all staff members.
      Returns:
      a list of `User` objects representing all staff members.

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff(User staffMember)
      Adds a new staff member to the system.
      Parameters:
      staffMember - the staff member to add.

    • removeStaff

      public boolean removeStaff(String staffID)
      Removes a staff member by their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the ID of the staff member to remove.
      Returns:
      `true` if the staff member was successfully removed, otherwise `false`.
